thread.title: Trump Asks 'Where is Rudy?' He's Right In Front of Him (Video)
thread.title_full: Trump Asks 'Where is Rudy?' He's Right In Front of Him (Video)

author: Just Jared
title: Trump Asks 'Where is Rudy?' He's Right In Front of Him (Video)
text:
Tweet Trump Asks 'Where is Rudy?' He's Right In Front of Him (Video) 
President Donald Trump decided to ask Rudy Giuliani to say some words during a meeting on cyber security and he had trouble figuring out where the former NYC mayor was… even though he was right in front of him. 
The President of the United States was sitting right across from Giuliani throughout the meeting and when he called on him to speak he said, “Where is Rudy ,” while looking around the room. 
Trump announced during the meeting that Giuliani will be working with his son-in-law Jared Kushner and that “ Rudy is very much an expert on cyber security. It’s been a very important thing for him and what he does.” Trump Asks ‘Where is Rudy?’ He’s Right In Front of Him
